items.question: What is Devstack?
items.answer: Devstack is a full-featured platform that helps you build and deploy web applications in a matter of minutes.

items.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
items.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time by logging into your account and following the instructions.

items.question: Can I change my plan later on?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Your new plan will take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.

items.question: Do you offer discounts for non-profit organizations?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 20% discount to non-profit organizations. Please contact us for more information.
